Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{3: 'The singing of whale is so loud that it makes Pulao roll to the ground.'}
{3: 'The hard floor helps Pulao to wake up. She holds on to the cabinet, finally reaching the whale-shaped alarm clock.'}
{3: 'When the room is quiet again, Pulao finally gets rid of the drowsiness. She combs her hair with her hand and sighs at the messy bed.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Sigh... I still can't get used to the morning alarm clock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Speaking of which, I haven't slept so well in a long time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hehe. I feel like I had a great dream.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "There were many familiar people and things, but I can't remember...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Whatever, the ending must be good. Otherwise, I wouldn't be smirking like this. I don't often do this!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Wake up, Pulao. We need another round of patrol before the celebration starts.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What, is it this late already?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao quickly jumps off the bed and takes the coat of Pulao Crew from the wall.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "What's this...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When her fingers run through the "Pu" on her coat, a calming mechanoid flashes through her memory.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'It feels so familiar. But why the bitter feeling...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: "Are you ready? I'm coming in."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Don't open the door! I'm coming right now!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory181.png'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's the annual celebration again. Can't you be a little happier, Yazi?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Don't push her, Pulao. Her face is always like this.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Fine. Speaking of which, can you stop hanging upside down? The children in the West District have complained quite a few times.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Little brats...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chiwen', 3: 'Sir, our market research indicates your prune drink will continue to be very popular. Make sure you stock up on it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "Of course, I learned it from Uncle Fu. It would be a disgrace if people don't like my drinksâ€”how can I claim to inherit his techniques then?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'By the way, would you like to try some shacha noodles first?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiwen', 3: "Thanks, but I'm fine."}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Ahem!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'll try them after I finish work!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiwen', 3: "Mr. Simpie, please don't unload your goods at the intersection. Can you move them to the side? We have more ship-repairing materials coming through later."}
{2: 'Mr. Simpie', 3: "Let's get working, Birdie."}
{2: 'Birdie', 3: 'Alright. One, two, three, go!'}
{2: 'Mr. Simpie', 3: 'Wanna go for a drink and performance after work? I heard the East District recently had a decent troupe of sword dancers.'}
{2: 'Mr. Simpie', 3: 'Let us treat you. After all, you gave us a hand when we were completely lost.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'No thanks, today is just a beginning. There are still a lot to do in the days to come.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mr. Simpie', 3: 'Okay then. We look forward to continuing working with you next year.'}
{2: 'Chiwen', 3: 'Me too.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Chiwen is always the busiest at the celebration.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiwen', 3: "We have the most trading activities going on at this time. It's better to be busy than sorry."}
{2: 'Chiwen', 3: 'What is Bixi doing? He never gave me a logistics plan. I have to handle everything.'}
{2: 'Bixi', 3: "Stop talking behind my back. I just reinforced all the equipment for tonight's performance. There is still a lot to fix on the ship."}
{2: 'Fuxi', 3: 'Qiuniu, I finished the firework that you asked me. I only have limited materials, the end result may not meet your requirement...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qiuniu', 3: "It's okay. We don't have a lot of supplies to waste. The entertainment budget is tight.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yazi', 3: "Where are those 4 newbies in your team? I didn't see them with you today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Babylonia helped to end our torment. But we can only depend on ourselves from now on.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'To do so, work-life balance is very important. So I gave them a day off today.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "You are thinking too much. I only want them to follow you so you don't get distracted by the toys and snacks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Really? But your panda wallet is full of Grubs.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yazi', 3: 'Okay, enough chatting.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Alright, I'll go check the data station and Yazi will watch the roof. I'll leave the dock to you, Pulao.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2501_02.jpg'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Sure. After patrolling the dock, I'll also search a 10km radius. I may be back late."}
{3: 'Pulao waves goodbye to the other Kowloong Crew. The morning sun shines upon her hair, leaving a golden glow.'}
{3: "With a smile on her face, she turns around and starts the day's work."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Chaofeng just had a late night and still has to patrol. Must not let down the guard when it comes to intelligence...'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Chiwen and Bixi haven't used the sleeping pod for two weeks."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Not only the Dragon Children, everyone on the Nighter has been working hard since that day... It's been tough for all of us."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "No, it's not the time to be sentimental."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I must help and understand others, and put everything into action!'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hmm... A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step! Here I go!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory181.png'}
{2: 'Huainan', 3: 'We came at the right time. Everyone is preparing for the celebration, it seems.'}
{2: 'Huainan', 3: "Aren't you going to check it out? Perhaps you will bump into the old friends you miss!"}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'If you want to see some old friends, you go yourself.'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'But I must warn you first. We are only going to cause unnecessary panic if we show up in public.'}
{2: 'Huainan', 3: 'Alas. Your "noble" Kowloong identity seems to cause more trouble now.'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: "You said you were just going to glance from afar. Now let's go."}
{2: 'Huainan', 3: 'Okie dokie. Hope everyone has a wonderful New Year.'}
